keyword: how many calories are in a string cheese
title: How Many Calories Are in a String Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a string cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a String Cheese?
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) low-moisture, part-skim mozzarella string cheese stick; no added flavors or wrappers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, size, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One string cheese stick provides ~80 kcal and ~7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a string cheese?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for one standard 28g stick.

faqs.q: Is string cheese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one stick has ~7 g protein, making it a good snack option.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in string cheese?
faqs.a: Very lowâ€”only 1 g carbs per stick, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does string cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: It contains ~200 mg sodium per stick, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in string cheese?
faqs.a: Brands vary; low-fat options are lower (50-70 kcal), full-fat higher (90+ kcal).
